text: Peter Fernandez (January 29, 1927 â€“ July 15, 2010) was an American actor, voice actor, director, author and child model. He was born in New York City. He began with a career in modeling stretching from the 1930s. He was probably best known for his roles in the 1967 anime Speed Racer and Astro Boy (1952-1968). He also had voice roles in Courage the Cowardly Dog.
